name: Lightstrike II Cannon
name_cn: 光击 II 能量加农炮
description:
Manufacturer: Esperia
Item Type: Laser Cannon 
Size: S2
The Lightstrike II takes the attack to distant targets by delivering focused, high damage blasts that will make any aggressor think twice before coming too close. Capable of providing powerful overwatch options during troop deployments or engaging targets in outer space, it's easy to see why the Lightstrike II was feared by UPE forces during the First Tevarin War.
description_cn:
制造商：埃斯佩里亚(Esperia)
武器类别：激光加农炮 
尺寸：S2
光击 II能对远处的目标进行精准且高伤害的打击，任何侵略者在接近前要应三思而后行。它具备在部署部队或在外太空和敌人交战时进行选择性火力掩护的能力，这也就不难理解为什么UPE在第一次塔维因战争时期中如此惧怕光击 II了。
